ticket.title: Docs updates: Implementor SKILL + RFC-0007 amendments + operational runbooks (broker/worker/lanes/gc)

in_scope: Update SKILL.md to include warm lifecycle, queue-based execution, and failure mode handling.
Update RFC-0007: mandate nextest and add containment constraints for caching.
Add runbook docs: bootstrap lanes, start services, respond to quarantine/denials, do safe lane reset.

steps: Draft doc changes and cross-link from RFC-0019 amendment.
Add example commands and expected outputs.

criteria: A new operator can bootstrap and run default-mode FAC with broker/worker without tribal knowledge.
